definition: not yet/did not/have not/not/8th earthly branch: 1-3 p.m., 6th solar month (7th July-6th August), year of the Sheep/ancient Chinese compass point: 210°
(completed action marker)/(modal particle indicating change of state, situation now)/(modal particle intensifying preceding clause)
to finish/to achieve/variant of 瞭|了[liao3]/to understand clearly
one's predestined fate is yet to be fulfilled (idiom)

sentences.english: Is it because I have some desires yet to realize?
sentences.chinese: 是因为我还有未了的心愿吗？

sentences.english: Dad : Let's go to see the movie. It's time to begin.
sentences.chinese: 爸爸和妈妈一起走着去电影院看《人鬼情未了》。

sentences.english: The new company has duly taken over all accounts outstanding and will take all responsibility for the settlement of accounts。
sentences.chinese: 新的公司已接管了一切未了帐目，并将负责清算。

sentences.english: No bird flies to the nest. With unfinished love, the setting sun sinks beyond the western mountain.
sentences.chinese: 没有一只鸟飞来，夕阳，揣着未了情，沉向西山。

sentences.english: Dad and Mom walk to the cinema to see Ghost.
sentences.chinese: 爸爸和妈妈一起走着去电影院看《人鬼情未了》。

sentences.english: We’re also seeing the reverberations of this crisis with the rise in foreclosures.
sentences.chinese: 这场危机仍然余波未了，房屋止赎数量还在上升。
还想达成什么未了心愿？

sentences.english: Yesterday I did nothing, but see the film of People Clever Sentiment Not.
sentences.chinese: 昨天我什么事也没做，只看了部电影《人鬼情未了》。

definition: a matter for regret or resentment
debt of gratitude coupled with duty to avenge
to stop/to cease/to dismiss/to suspend/to quit/to finish
quiet, silent, and lonely/far and indistinct/gone without a trace
to hear suddenly/to learn of sth unexpectedly
